name: NightCrawler
description:
• "Wave after Wave of Terror"

Your childhood friend calls you to fight the forest monsters that he has awakened.
Experience the thrill of dynamic and fast gameplay with the dash mechanic within beautiful voxel environments.



  • "Survive the Night!"

Unlock an arsenal of weapons and fight up to 7 Boss , each with their distinct tactics and strengths to become the ultimate warrior in this relentless, action-packed game! As night falls, face hordes of enemies in a battle for survival. Your skills will be put to the ultimate test
